summary: REQ-8 (visible build identifier) appears implemented via a buildInfo module and a footer display in MobileShell, with the build ID sourced from a Vite build-time env var set by a build script. REQ-7 (repo-local deployment guide) cannot be fully verified from the provided diff summary because the actual root-level DEPLOYMENT.md file is not included among the added files (only referenced indirectly).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a clear, repo-local deployment guide and scripts so the latest frontend + backend can be deployed to the Internet Computer and the deployed URL can be retrieved reliably.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show a root-level deployment document (e.g., DEPLOYMENT.md) being added/modified, so the required guide content (prereqs, build steps, deploy steps, URL retrieval) cannot be confirmed from the evidence provided. While frontend-file-summaries.txt mentions DEPLOYMENT.md, the file itself is not present in the added/modified file list or shown.
evidence: <file-diff> ADDED FILES list (does not include DEPLOYMENT.md)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions DEPLOYMENT.md but does not include its content)
